WorkItem.Description:
After sending multiple RaiseCanExecuteChanged commands for certain DelegateCommand the software memory consumption increases.
Has anyone encountered a similar problem? And is there a way to solve it?

Comments.Message:
Hi,

It would be useful if you could provide us with more information about your application and what is triggering the memory leak in it, so that we could analyze the problem in more detail.

Also, a repro-sample application portraying the memory leak could be also useful in order to debug the problem.

Thanks,

Damian Cherubinihttp://blogs.southworks.net/dcherubini
